themes.description: S&P 500 faces unique crossroads with multiple long-range monthly cycles overlapping, geometric patterns at target point D, and negative divergences on weekly indicators. Multiple independent analysis methods converge on the same conclusion: a significant technical correction is approaching.

Recent steps by the Trump administration in trade could significantly impact the global economy and financial markets, with potential for economic slowdown, rising prices, and increased volatility across all asset classes.

March 21 marks the spring equinox - one of Gann's four key astronomical turning points. When the sun crosses the celestial equator northward, markets historically tend to set up for a new momentum phase. Combined with the S&P 500 double cycle on March 18-19, this creates a significant potential turning point window.

Despite March being seasonally the most negative month for Gold, the long-term wave structure (Elliott 5-wave pattern) and Fibonacci extensions point to targets of $3,010-$3,042. The primary trend remains decisively bullish.
The Euro broke key support at 1.0520-1.0455 in January and remains in a bearish phase. No weekly cycle in March means daily consolidation continues. Preferred strategy is short at resistance levels.

Oil cycle-based trading has delivered 133%+ cumulative movements over seven months while the underlying asset price remained essentially unchanged. This demonstrates the power of cycle timing even in range-bound markets.

Historical events in March across multiple decades (2015 Greek debt crisis, 2005 pre-crash bubble, 1995 globalization, 1985 Gorbachev, 1975 end of wars) suggest this month has historically been a period of significant trend changes in economic, political, and geopolitical dimensions.

CNN Fear & Greed Index progression: 20 (Extreme Fear) end of December, 28 end of January, 46 end of February. The recovery from extreme fear typically precedes market rallies, but the index remains below neutral, suggesting caution.

risk_rules: Maintain 30-40% of portfolio in liquid assets not invested in equity markets during periods of uncertainty.
Set stop-loss orders at reasonable distances - below daily or weekly support/resistance levels that have been broken.
Avoid leveraged long ETF positions (x2, x3) in the S&P 500 during correction signals. Consider closing existing leveraged positions and moving to 1:1 tracking.
For long positions in leveraged instruments, close existing positions and switch to instruments reflecting the index at 1:1 ratio.
All turning point dates may deviate by +/- 1 day from the marked date - be prepared for this.
When approaching a double cycle (two turning dates close together), the first date typically triggers a direction change and the second reinforces the original trend direction.
Do not mark turning dates in advance as 'high' or 'low' - direction is only known when observing price movement into the cycle date.

The turning point dates are an indication of a 'turning point' in the current movement. The classic movement pattern is high-low-high, but absolutely there are cases where dates catch consecutive highs or consecutive lows.

Short trades for short-term should only be considered when: N-pattern downward appears on daily/4-hour chart + combined with turning point date at resistance level or within a cycle-to-cycle downward movement.
In Oil, the $71.50-$73.00 zone acts as both support and resistance - expect volatile price action.
Bitcoin limited history (14 years) makes seasonal analysis less reliable - prioritize technical levels and real-time updates.
Stay connected to the Discord community for real-time updates throughout the month, as conditions change dynamically.
The information is for educational and learning purposes only - not investment advice.

seasonal_summary.gold: Most negative month of the year

previous_month_performance.sp500: 3 out of 4 turning dates were successful, capturing all extreme points and significant movements
previous_month_performance.bitcoin: All 4 dates arrived on time. Date 4 (Feb 27) ended decline and started 20% rise to March
previous_month_performance.eurusd: All 4 dates delivered expected outcomes, one slightly late (Feb 7 arrived Feb 10)
previous_month_performance.gold: All 3 dates successful, all traded successfully in the Discord community
previous_month_performance.oil: 3 dates, one missing (Feb 11). Cumulative movement of approximately 13.5% from turning dates
